dart-monkey.description: Shoots a single dart. Can upgrade to piercing darts and long range darts.

tack-tower.description: Shoots volleys of tacks in 8 directions. Can upgrade its shoot speed and its range.

ice-tower.description: Freezes nearby bloons. Frozen bloons are immune to darts and tacks, but bombs will destroy them. Can upgrade to increased freeze time and larger freeze radius.

bomb-towner.description: Launches a bomb that explodes on impact. Can upgrade to bigger bombs and longer range.

super-monkey.description: Super monkey shoots a continuous stream of darts and can mow down even the fastest and most stubborn bloons.
